description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任深圳市副市长、厦门市副市长、深圳市人大常委会副主任等职。2014年因抑郁症跳楼自杀。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Deputy Mayor of Shenzhen, Deputy Mayor of Xiamen, and Deputy Director of the Standing Committee of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Congress. He committed suicide in 2014 due to depression.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省广州市的一所高等农业院校，是华南农业大学的前身之一。
description.en: An institution of higher agricultural education located in Guangzhou, Guangdong, China, one of the predecessors of South China Agricultural University.

en: Guangdong Province Bao'an County Agricultural Bureau

description.zh-cn: 广东省宝安县的政府农业部门。
description.en: The government agricultural department of Bao'an County, Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 广东省宝安县的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Bao'an County, Guangdong Province.

nodes.id: 深圳市宝安区人民政府

zh-cn: 深圳市宝安区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 广东省深圳市宝安区的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Bao'an District, Shenzhen, Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省深圳市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Shenzhen, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省厦门市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Xiamen, Fujian Province, People's Republic of China.

en: Standing Committee of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 深圳市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 袁汝稳是广东东莞人。
description.en: Yuan Ruwen was from Dongguan, Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 1969年9月毕业于华南农学院农学系农学专业。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Agronomy, Agronomy Major, at South China Agricultural College in September 1969.

description.zh-cn: 1970年8月起，供职于广东省宝安县农业局。
description.en: Beginning in August 1970, he worked at the Guangdong Province Bao'an County Agricultural Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 1987年，担任广东省宝安县副县长。
description.en: In 1987, he served as the Deputy County Mayor of Bao'an County, Guangdong Province.

relationships.target: 深圳市宝安区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 1993年，担任深圳市宝安区区长。
description.en: In 1993, he served as the District Mayor of Bao'an District, Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 1995年5月，担任深圳市人民政府副市长。
description.en: In May 1995, he served as the Deputy Mayor of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1999年4月，改任福建省厦门市人民政府副市长。
description.en: In April 1999, he was reassigned as the Deputy Mayor of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government, Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 2000年6月，任深圳市人大常委会副主任。
description.en: In June 2000, he served as the Deputy Director of the Standing Committee of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，袁汝稳是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Yuan Ruwen was a member of the Communist Party of China.
